trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of choices for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific" /> 类的选项集合。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: Accessing the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific.Choices%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific> object retrieves a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 访问<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific.Choices%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific>对象检索<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection>对象。

trans-unit.source: This collection implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface (through the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ArrayListCollectionBase> object); it implements all properties and methods of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此集合实现<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口 (通过<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ArrayListCollectionBase>对象); 它实现所有属性和方法的<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection> class to gain access to the choices in a DeviceSpecific/Choice construct.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection>类来访问设备特定/选择构造中的选项。

trans-unit.source: For your convenience, a Web.config file containing the filters follows the example code.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，包含筛选器的 Web.config 文件的示例代码的后面。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />；权限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> object to add to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合末尾的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> object to the end of a collection.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> 对象添加到集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the Add method to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice> object programmatically (with a filter named `isCHTML10`) to the form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的 Add 方法将添加<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice>对象以编程方式 (与名为的筛选器`isCHTML10`) 到窗体。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection> overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例的一个更大的示例摘自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection>概述。

trans-unit.source: The location in the collection at which to add <c>choice</c>.
trans-unit.target: 集合中要添加 <c>choice</c> 的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a choice at the location in the collection specified by the <paramref name="index" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在集合中 <paramref name="index" /> 参数指定的位置添加一个选项。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: A value of -1 for the `index` parameter specifies that the command is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 值为-1`index`参数指定的命令将添加到集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中检索 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> objects contained by the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合包含的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: This method is not available in the read-only <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不是位于只读<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection>接口。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection.Clear%2A> method for all the classes where this method applies.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection.Clear%2A>其中此方法适用的所有类的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection.Clear%2A> method for a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet> collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection>, it clears all the choices in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection.Clear%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet>集合清除集合中的或有关的所有样式<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection>，它将都清除集合中的所有选项。

trans-unit.source: Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.
trans-unit.target: 将字段添加到字段的对象列表更改数据绑定行为的控件，并要求你将数据重新绑定到控件。

trans-unit.source: The index number of the item to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中检索的项的索引号。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> item in the collection, by index.
trans-unit.target: 按索引返回集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> 项。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> object at the given <paramref name="index" /> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中位于指定 <paramref name="index" /> 处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" /> to remove
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice" />

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified choice.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定的选项。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The index number of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的项的索引号。

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定索引处的项。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
